original_title: Corrie ten Boom: A Faith Undefeated
overview: When Nazi forces invaded Holland in 1940 and began rounding up Jews, Corrie ten Boom, her sister Betsie, and their elderly father risked their lives to save as many as possible. Corrie ten Boom: a Faith Undefeated recounts this unforgettable story for a new generation.
title: Corrie ten Boom: A Faith Undefeated
